hero.title: Want to be your best version?
hero.subtitle: Together we'll embark on a journey to find peace

about.title: About
about.paragraph1: Eti Zak, age 44, mother of 3 children. Li-CBT therapist, instructor and lecturer for youth and adults. Graduate of MA from University of Haifa, engaged for years in therapy and assistance to at-risk populations alongside extensive work in the public sector.
about.paragraph2: Throughout my life I have dealt with many challenges, experiences and anxieties that affected me and led me to undergo a deep internal process accompanied by meaningful research and learning on the subject. One of my insights was to share and teach people to overcome daily difficulties and move from a place of difficulty to a new path where you can smile and function better.
about.paragraph3: I see the opportunity to help others as my mission and calling. As an athlete and triathlete, I believe in sports as a way of life for body and soul that helps overcome crises. A healthy lifestyle and use of sports to strengthen and empower the soul.

method.title: The Method
method.intro: Short-term, focused, effective and practical treatment that will help you return to better functioning, appreciate and love yourself. During the treatment I will help you notice the connection between beliefs and thoughts, to emotions and patterns of behavior they entail.
method.description: We will learn to deal with cognitive distortions, negative thoughts, fears and avoidances.
method.adapted: The treatment method is personally adapted according to:
method.result: At the end of the process you will feel that your anxiety threshold has dropped significantly, your perspective will change and you will be able to find solutions in a place that used to be an obstacle for you.

cta.title: Want to Start Your Journey?
cta.subtitle: Leave your details and I'll get back to you soon

form.name: Name
form.success: Thank you! I will contact you soon.

stages.title: Treatment Stages
stages.intro: The treatment process is divided into clear stages that lead to real and lasting change:
stages.stage1: Initial consultation and understanding the difficulty
stages.stage2: Skill building and learning coping tools

item1.title: People suffering from anxiety and stress
item1.description: If you experience constant worry, stress or panic attacks

item2.title: Coping with trauma or crisis
item2.description: Support and tools for processing difficult experiences

item3.title: Life transitions and changes
item3.description: Help adapting to new situations and significant changes

item4.title: Relationship difficulties
item4.description: Improving communication and building healthy relationships

item5.title: Personal growth and empowerment
item5.description: Development of self-awareness and realization of potential

advantages.title: Advantages of Li-CBT Treatment
advantages.intro: Li-CBT therapy offers proven advantages that will help you achieve lasting change:

shortTerm.title: Short-term and Focused
shortTerm.description: Therapy focused on specific goals with a clear timeframe. Most processes range from 12-20 sessions.

focused.title: Goal-oriented
focused.description: We work on specific, measurable goals tailored to your needs and difficulties.

rootCause.title: Addresses Root Causes
rootCause.description: Identifies and treats the source of the problem, not just symptoms.

practical.title: Practical Tools
practical.description: You receive practical tools and techniques that you can use in daily life.

longTerm.title: Long-term Results
longTerm.description: The skills you acquire remain with you even after therapy ends.

active.title: Active Collaboration
active.description: You are an active partner in the process with homework and practice between sessions.

structured.title: Structured and Clear
structured.description: Clear structure with defined goals and measurable progress.

measurable.title: Proven Effectiveness
measurable.description: Research-based method with proven effectiveness for various difficulties.

testimonials.title: What Clients Say
testimonials.testimonial1: "The therapy with Eti changed my life. I learned to identify and change thought patterns that held me back for years. Today I feel much more confident and calm."
testimonials.testimonial2: "As a mother of three, I was overwhelmed by anxiety and stress. Eti gave me practical tools that I use every day. I highly recommend!"
testimonials.testimonial3: "The professional, warm and sensitive treatment. Eti accompanied me through a difficult period and helped me find inner strength I didn't know I had."
testimonials.testimonial4: "After years of struggling with social anxiety, I can finally say I enjoy social situations. The therapy was exactly what I needed."
testimonials.testimonial5: "Eti is not only a professional therapist but also a warm and understanding person. She created a safe space where I could open up and work on myself."

about.title: About
about.description: Licensed Li-CBT therapist specializing in treatment for anxiety, stress and life challenges. Personal, professional and effective treatment.

hero.title: Welcome to CBT Therapy
hero.subtitle: Licensed therapist specializing in cognitive behavioral therapy for mothers and women

about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a licensed CBT therapist with extensive experience working with women and mothers. I believe every woman can develop tools to cope with life's challenges and live fuller, more fulfilling lives.
about.approach: My approach is based on scientifically proven CBT principles, combined with sensitivity and compassion appropriate for women and mothers.

anxiety.title: Anxiety Treatment
anxiety.description: Tools for coping with general anxiety, social anxiety, and panic

depression.title: Depression Treatment
depression.description: Support and tools for dealing with depression and feelings of hopelessness

motherhood.title: Motherhood & Therapy
motherhood.description: Support for mothers dealing with stress, anxiety, and postpartum depression

relationships.title: Relationships & Couples
relationships.description: Tools for improving communication and healthy relationships
